docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday sided with a former driver for UPS Inc by giving her another chance to argue that the package delivery company discriminated against her when it refused to lighten her work duties while she was pregnant.

headline.main: U.S. Supreme Court Revives Pregnant Worker’s Case Against UPS
headline.print_headline: U.S. Supreme Court Revives Pregnant Worker’s Case Against UPS

docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday sided with a former driver for UPS Inc by giving her another chance to argue that the package delivery company discriminated against her when it refused to lighten her work duties while she was pregnant.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court gave a former UPS driver another chance Wednesday to prove her claim of discrimination after the company did not offer her lighter duty when she was pregnant.

headline.main: Justices Revive Ex-UPS Worker's Pregnancy Bias Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Justices Revive Ex-UPS Worker's Pregnancy Bias Lawsuit

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court gave a former UPS driver another chance Wednesday to prove her claim of discrimination after the company did not offer her lighter duty when she was pregnant.

headline.main: Live Chat With Amy Klein: Tuesday, March 24, 9 P.M. Eastern Time

docs.abstract: Amy Klein will answer questions about her journey from infertility treatment to pregnancy.
docs.snippet: Amy Klein will answer questions about her journey from infertility treatment to pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Alen Muhic, who was conceived when his mother was raped by a soldier in wartime, says he would not have had the courage to search for his parents were it not for the film cameras that followed him.

headline.main: Bosnian Conceived in Wartime Rape Searches for His Parents
headline.print_headline: Bosnian Conceived in Wartime Rape Searches for His Parents

docs.snippet: Alen Muhic, who was conceived when his mother was raped by a soldier in wartime, says he would not have had the courage to search for his parents were it not for the film cameras that followed him.

docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Ted Cruz’s speech announcing his 2016 presidential campaign captured so many Republican paradoxes and idiocies, especially on immigration and health care.
docs.abstract: Editorial argues that substance of Sen Ted Cruz's speech at Liberty University, in which he announced that he is running for 2016 Republican presidential nomination, is at odds with reality; suggests that Cruz's federalist views are incoherent; welcomes fact that Cruz will serve in Republican primary to illustrate many of the paradoxes and idiocies that party must sort out before election.
docs.snippet: Senator Ted Cruz’s speech announcing his 2016 presidential campaign captured so many Republican paradoxes and idiocies, especially on immigration and health care.

docs.lead_paragraph: The schoolboy watched as a man tried to remove the nappy of a little girl he was dragging along a Nairobi riverbank, suspecting that he was going to rape her.

headline.main: Kenyan Schoolboys Save Girls From Rape After Learning 'No Means No'
headline.print_headline: Kenyan Schoolboys Save Girls From Rape After Learning 'No Means No'

docs.snippet: The schoolboy watched as a man tried to remove the nappy of a little girl he was dragging along a Nairobi riverbank, suspecting that he was going to rape her.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two adventurers, unafraid of winter, marry in an ice hotel as a blizzard bears down.

headline.main: Cold Enough to Warm the Heart
headline.print_headline: Cold Enough to Warm the Heart

docs.abstract: Vows column on wedding of Tina Zanetti and Tyler Forsyth.
docs.snippet: Two adventurers, unafraid of winter, marry in an ice hotel as a blizzard bears down.

docs.lead_paragraph: The ethicists consider reader questions about teenage sex, workplace conduct and interviewing for jobs while pregnant.

headline.main: Do You Tell a Friend His Daughter Is Sexually Active?
headline.print_headline: Do You Tell a Friend That His Daughter Is Having Sex?

docs.abstract: The Ethicists column panel answers questions about divulging a minor's confidence to her parents, disclosing a manager's act of bringing children to the workplace to her boss and withholding fact that one is pregnant to a prospective employer.
docs.snippet: The ethicists consider reader questions about teenage sex, workplace conduct and interviewing for jobs while pregnant.
